title: Enhancing Language Education Competency Through Reflective Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and language teaching experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, with iterative reflection on learners' application of instructional design theories to real-world language education scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically externalize instructional strategies using OMNIBUS ontology-based analysis tools when designing language education
Learners can reflectively improve their instructional design by analyzing I_L event decomposition trees generated after project-based assignments
Learners can identify over 80% of knowledge gaps discovered in language education design through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
